short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the lame X logo with the OG Twitter Bird logo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you replace the X logo on Twitter/X.com to the OG Twitter bird logo. No need to look at the ugly logo that feels like a 5 year old designed. Scroll peacefully now that your favourite logo is back!
